thread.title: Mike
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text:
Very helpful on the phone. Price was right. Ordered online and shipped to California. Bike arrived pre-assembled and repacked in original box. With a small amount of assembly, handlebars, petals and seats we were ready to ride with exactly what we ordered.
THANK YOU!!!
